    • hasScoreProperty

      boolean hasScoreProperty()
      Returns whether the SolrPersistentEntity has an score property. If this call returns true, getScoreProperty() will return a non-null value.
      Returns:
      false when SolrPersistentEntity does not define a score property.
      Since:
      1.4

    • getScoreProperty

      @Nullable SolrPersistentProperty getScoreProperty()
      Returns the score property of the SolrPersistentEntity. Can be null in case no score property is available on the entity.
      Returns:
      the score SolrPersistentProperty of the PersistentEntity or null if not defined.
      Since:
      1.4
